allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Unify agent frontmatter and remove duplicates

Changes:
- ORCHESTRATOR: Add strict delegation rules (NEVER write code/tests),
  parallel execution protocol, quality gates, fast-track routing
- All 14 agents: Unified frontmatter with type, trigger, behavior fields
- Remove duplicate Identity sections from all agents
- Delete duplicate workflows: EPIC-FLOW, DEVELOPMENT-FLOW, PLANNING-FLOW
- Add templates: TEST-TEMPLATES, BACKEND-TEMPLATES, FRONTEND-TEMPLATES
- Add migration docs (sharded from single MIGRATION-GUIDE.md)

Agent model assignments:
- opus: ORCHESTRATOR, SENIOR-DEV, PM-AGENT, ARCHITECT-AGENT, PRODUCT-OWNER
- sonnet: All other agents (development, quality, planning)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Expand SCRUM-MASTER agent to full specification

- Add complete workflow with 5 steps and checkpoints
- Add sprint planning, monitoring, blocker removal, review, retro
- Add output templates (sprint plan, review, retrospective)
- Add common mistakes, error recovery, quality checklist
- Add handoff protocols to ORCHESTRATOR
- Expand from 66 lines to 594 lines

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

)")
